class.name: AudioStreamBlipKit
class.brief_description: An audio stream used to configure a [AudioStreamBlipKitPlayback].
class.description: See the description of [AudioStreamBlipKitPlayback] on how to attach [BlipKitTrack]s.

members.member: Sets the number of ticks per second for the master clock at which effects and instrument envelopes are updated in [BlipKitTrack]. This also defines the interval at which tick functions are called in [AudioStreamBlipKitPlayback].
